2.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 180

0.text: Innate: Whenever a  turret outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by Azir.
0.html: Innate: Whenever a turret outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by Azir.

1.text: Innate - Disc of the Sun: Azir can select a marker to construct the Sun Disc above the ruins after a 0.5-second cast time. The Sun Disc will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.
1.html: Innate - Disc of the Sun: Azir can select a marker to construct the Sun Disc above the ruins after a 0.5-second cast time. The Sun Disc will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.

2.text: The Sun Disc functions the same as a standard inner turret, gains 15% AP  bonus attack damage, and grants its kill credit to Azir. The Sun Disc's  health decays over 60 seconds and loses  100 armor while Azir is not alive or is too far away.
2.html: The Sun Disc functions the same as a standard inner turret, gains 15% AP  bonus attack damage, and grants its kill credit to Azir. The Sun Disc's  health decays over 60 seconds and loses  100 armor while Azir is not alive or is too far away.

3.text: Azir cannot construct a Sun Disc with the marker while he is unable to cast abilities.
3.html: Azir cannot construct a Sun Disc with the marker while he is unable to cast abilities.

4.text: See Pets for more details about the Sun Disc.
4.html: See Pets for more details about the Sun Disc.

2.text: WIDTH:  140

0.text: Active: Azir orders all Sand Soldiers to dash toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through and  slowing them by 25% for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Azir orders all Sand Soldiers to dash toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through and slowing them by 25% for 1 second.

1.text: Enemies hit by subsequent soldiers are instead  slowed by an additional 25% per soldier.
1.html: Enemies hit by subsequent soldiers are instead slowed by an additional 25% per soldier.

2.text: Conquering Sands will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Conquering Sands will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

2.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: Passive: Azir gains  bonus attack speed, doubled for 5 seconds if he summons a third concurrent soldier.
0.html: Passive: Azir gains  bonus attack speed, doubled for 5 seconds if he summons a third concurrent soldier.

1.text: Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier at the target location that is  untargetable, lasts 10 seconds, and grants  sight of its surroundings. The Sand Soldier expires twice as fast while within range of an enemy  turret, and does so instantly if Azir is too far away.Azir periodically stocks a Sand Soldier, up to a maximum of 2.
1.html:
Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier at the target location that is untargetable, lasts 10 seconds, and grants sight of its surroundings. The Sand Soldier expires twice as fast while within range of an enemy turret, and does so instantly if Azir is too far away.

Azir periodically stocks a Sand Soldier, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: When Azir declares a basic attack against an enemy in a soldier's  attack range, the Sand Soldier attacks in his stead, dealing 50 − 150 (based on level) (+ 60% AP) magic damage to enemies struck in a line. Targets beyond the closest take 25 / 50 / 75 / 100% (based on level) damage. Subsequent Sand Soldiers beyond the first deal 25% damage.
2.html: When Azir declares a basic attack against an enemy in a soldier's  attack range, the Sand Soldier attacks in his stead, dealing 50 − 150 (based on level) (+ 60% AP) magic damage to enemies struck in a line. Targets beyond the closest take 25 / 50 / 75 / 100% (based on level) damage. Subsequent Sand Soldiers beyond the first deal 25% damage.

3.text: Sand Soldiers cannot attack  structures,  wards, nor  traps.
3.html: Sand Soldiers cannot attack structures, wards, nor traps.

4.text: Arise! will cast at max range if cast beyond that. See Pets for more details about Sand Soldiers.
4.html: Arise! will cast at max range if cast beyond that. See Pets for more details about Sand Soldiers.

2.text: COST: 60 MANA

0.text: Active: Azir  shields himself for 1.5 seconds and  dashes to the target Sand Soldier, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through.
0.html: Active: Azir shields himself for 1.5 seconds and dashes to the target Sand Soldier, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through.

1.text: If Azir dashes into an enemy  champion, he stops and gains a charge of  Arise!.
1.html: If Azir dashes into an enemy champion, he stops and gains a charge of Arise!.

2.text: Azir can cast of any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Azir can cast of any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Azir calls forth a phalanx of soldiers from 175 units behind him, catching enemies from up to 325 units behind him and charging forward 575 units in the target direction.
0.html: Active: Azir calls forth a phalanx of soldiers from 175 units behind him, catching enemies from up to 325 units behind him and charging forward 575 units in the target direction.

1.text: Enemies impacted by the charge are dealt magic damage and  knocked away over 1 second to a line 650 units in front of Azir.
1.html: Enemies impacted by the charge are dealt magic damage and knocked away over 1 second to a line 650 units in front of Azir.

2.text: Upon finishing their charge, the soldiers stand as a wall for 5 seconds, acting as impassible terrain against enemies and granting  sight of their surroundings. Azir and his allies can move through these soldiers.
2.html: Upon finishing their charge, the soldiers stand as a wall for 5 seconds, acting as impassible terrain against enemies and granting sight of their surroundings. Azir and his allies can move through these soldiers.

2.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 180

0.text: Innate: Whenever a  turret outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by Azir.
0.html: Innate: Whenever a turret outside the enemy team's base is destroyed, a marker is placed above its ruins which can be targeted by Azir.

1.text: Innate - Disc of the Sun: Azir can select a marker to construct the Sun Disc above the ruins after a 0.5-second cast time. The Sun Disc will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.
1.html: Innate - Disc of the Sun: Azir can select a marker to construct the Sun Disc above the ruins after a 0.5-second cast time. The Sun Disc will activate after being assembled over 5 seconds.

2.html: The Sun Disc functions the same as a standard inner turret, gains 15% AP  bonus attack damage, and grants its kill credit to Azir. The Sun Disc's  health decays over 60 seconds and loses  100 armor while Azir is not alive or is too far away.

3.text: Azir cannot construct a Sun Disc with the marker while he is unable to cast abilities.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CINDERBLOOM: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a  shield within the last 5 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Azir  shields himself for 1.5 seconds and  dashes to the target Sand Soldier, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through.
